Description: The Department of Justice entered into an agreement with Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies Corporation (Wabtec) regarding improper payments to government officials in India in violation of the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act. The agreement required that Wabtec pay a $300,000 penalty, implement rigorous internal controls, and cooperate fully with the Department.
